block.p: GREEN--Sylvia, 94. It is with profound sadness that we mourn the loss of our wonderful mother, grandmother and great-grandmother on June 15, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Isadore, devoted mother of the late Evelyn and Dr. Hans Laufer and Barbara and Dr. Lionel Roseff. Loving grandmother or Jessica and Dr. Neal Halfon, Dr. Marc and Dr. Sue Laufer, Leonard and Terry Laufer, Lisa and Bruce Shalett and Tracy and Saul Kattan. Adored great-grandmother of Isaac and Emma Halfon, Isabella and Alexandra Laufer, Arianna and Eli Laufer, Zachary and Matthew Shalett, Alex and Andrew Kattan. Funeral services Sunday, 10:30am, Riverside Nassau Chapel, Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY.
